contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{nihongo|'''Kodama'''|児玉郡|Kodama-gun}} is a [[districts of Japan|district]] located in [[Saitama Prefecture|Saitama]], [[Japan]]. As of October 1, 2004, the district has an estimated [[population]] of 79,096. The total area is 163.10 km². There are three towns located side by side with the city of [[Honjō, Saitama|Honjō]]. *[[Kamikawa, Saitama|Kamikawa]] *[[Kamisato, Saitama|Kamisato]] *[[Misato, Saitama (town)|Misato]] ==Municipal Timeline== *On January 1, 2006 the village of [[Kamiizumi, Saitama|Kamiizumi]] merged with the old town of [[Kamikawa, Saitama|Kamikawa]] to form the new town of [[Kamikawa, Saitama|Kamikawa]] *On January 10, 2006 the town of [[Kodama, Saitama|Kodama]] merged with the old city of [[Honjō, Saitama|Honjō]] to form the new city of [[Honjō, Saitama|Honjō]]. {{Saitama}} {{coord|36.206|N|139.092|E|type:landmark_source:itwiki|display=title}} [[Category:Districts in Saitama Prefecture]] {{Saitama-geo-stub}}
